column4: can someone tell me how to get rythmbox to stop opening when I connect my iPod?
can someone tell me how to get rythmbox to stop opening when I connect my iPod?
can someone tell me how to get rythmbox to stop opening when I connect my iPod?
there is an ipod plugin i think you can disable in rhythmbox
Got a link?
in nautilus's pref, there is a tab for media. try setting the one for music player to nothing or to prompt, etc
That doesn't work in hardy
still there... in gconf-editor, you go to gnome, volume manager, there is an option for autorun ipod that you can change
np. I never knew it was there. here is the link: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=291584
Just won't work
you set the value to 1 in gconf-editor? Apart from that, I'm not sure.
I got an idea, with the autoipod_command, I removed the word rhythmbox from it
ok
did you uncheck it
that should have disabled it altogether
i guess removing rhythmbox is a good solution. did it work?
I don't know.
go to prompts and disable the ipod photos... maybe that will start it up too
perhaps try that
with the value unchecked, perhaps reboot, or at least log out and back in
Gonna restart X
did it work?
Not the slightest bit
